# mediaType

**Instance Property**

A constant describing the media type of an `AVCaptureDevice` active or supported format.

## Declaration

```swift
var mediaType: AVMediaType { get }
```

## Determining supported media formats

- **formatDescription**: An object describing the capture format.

items.description: An object describing the capture format.
items.name: formatDescription
